description: This file defines navigation routes for an Android TV app using Jetpack Compose Navigation. It includes route constants, a function to generate a details route with an ID, and a Composable function to set up the navigation host with destination screens. Additionally, it contains UI scaffolding for displaying screen titles and subtitles.

classes.name: Routes
classes.description: Object holding route string constants and a helper function to generate detailed route paths with IDs.

methods.name: detailsFor
methods.description: Generates a details route string for a specific item ID.

methods.name: AppNavHost
methods.description: Sets up the navigation host with composable destinations: Home, Details, Search, and Settings screens.
